title: The Post
creator_credit: 20th Century Fox, DreamWorks Pictures, Reliance Entertainment, TSG Entertainment, Participant Media, Amblin Entertainment, Pascal Pictures, Star Thrower Entertainment, Ann Roth, Steven Spielberg, Rick Carter, Josh Singer, Kristie Macosko Krieger, Amy Pascal and Liz Hannah
brief_description: A cover-up that spanned four U.S. Presidents pushed the country’s first female newspaper publisher and a hard-driving editor to join an unprecedented battle between journalist and government. Inspired by true events.

constellations_other.name: Uncovering the truth
constellations_other.description: The images of Tank Man during the Tiananmen Square protests in 1989 were captured by photojournalists and shared around the world. The work of journalists has been key to uncovering abuses of power and are rich material for fictional and factual movies and TV.
